output: html_document

```{r}
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(lubridate)
readr::read_rds("DS_Final_App/data/tidy_covid19_case.rds") -> 
  covid19
```

```{r}
covid19 %>% 
  na_if("Missing") %>% 
  na_if("Unknown") %>% 
  mutate(case_month = ym(case_month)) %>% 
  mutate(sex = as.factor(sex))
```
